t: Find a Missing Item from Your Amazon Order - Amazon Customer Service
s: If an item is missing from your package, it may have shipped separately. Learn how to check if the missing item is in another package.

t: What happens if I’ve forgot to include a small piece in the box when returning/refunding a large item to Amazon? - Quora
Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: In their system, it only says 1 box so they are of no help. My only options are a refund or to replace it and hope I receive 2 boxes next time. Amazon needs to update their system to clearly show 2 boxes with 2 tracking numbers.

t: Returns and Replacements - FAQ - Amazon Customer Service
s: For issues related to defective items received by a customer, Amazon does not have a provision for processing replacements or refunds to customers. The customer must reach out to the brand/service centre for further resolutions (repair, replacement, warranty, etc.) according to the brand warranty ...

t: About Mistaken Returns to Amazon - Amazon Customer Service
s: Ensure you send the correct and complete item when making a return. The correct item must be returned to receive a refund.

t: Return Items You Ordered - Amazon Customer Service
s: Each return label is assigned to a specific return. To receive the correct refund, don't include items from multiple orders or shipments in the same box.

t: Replace a Damaged, Defective, or Broken Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find more solutions · Visit Your Orders and we will let you know what your options are for damaged, defective, or broken items

t: Incorrect, Damaged, or Missing Amazon Fresh or Whole Foods Market Items - Amazon Customer Service
s: Items can be substituted or removed from your order after checkout due to availability. Check the order details in Your Account to see any substitutions or undeliverable items.

t: r/NoStupidQuestions on Reddit: Returning one Amazon order that came in two boxes.
Amazon
s: Accept the return straight away and get a postage label to the customer. Then wait and see if she actually sends it back and whether its in the exact condition you sent it out in. If its a nested set of 3 would they all be in the same box? would the weight be different?

s: December 23, 2024 - There are many ways Amazon will help get your return off your hands for free, including drop-off options at Staples, Whole Foods Market, and Kohl’s locations.

t: Do I need the box that my Amazon package came in to return it? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): Not the outside box that it was shipped in that had the address label. But you should have all the original packaging that goes to the product. Depending on how you return it (Kohls/Whole Foods), they’ll take the item as is without it packaged up. If you decide to ship it back ...

t: What I can do if Amazon give me empty box instead of item? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 9): You have to be able to prove to them that you never got the item. They will say that the item was shipped and delivered. What you can do is call the place it was shipped from and file a complaint and hope they have mercy on your words. The investigation will be long and drawn out.
